mapper.insert: insert into reservation (rez_no, rez_customer_id, rez_res_no, rez_clock_no, rez_seat_no, rez_customer_count, rez_seat_qty, rez_request) values (#{rezNo}, #{rezCustomerId}, #{rezResNo}, #{rezClockNo}, #{rezSeatNo}, #{rezCustomerCount}, #{rezSeatQty}, #{rezRequest})
mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where rez_customer_id = #{rezCustomerId}
